name: The King of Bootlegging
description:
This is a game that looks and plays like a board game!

Set in the prohibition era 1920s you are the head of your own crime family.

Fight for control over the areas of the board and make money producing and selling bootleg liquor!

Hire new gangsters to control areas and use them to fight enemies for their areas.

Features!

-Board game like turn-based action phases:

-Draw a card

-Move your pawns to control areas

-Use cards strategically

-End turn

-Three different modes with adjustable turns limit:

-Control the most areas

-Earn the most money

-Conquer all enemies

-Play against the custom made AI players.

-Five different endings depending on your actions.

Demo includes all the features except the 2nd and 3rd game modes.

Instead it has only one game mode : Control the most areas with 15 days limit

If you are interested download the demo, and if you like to support buy the full version!
